plot: James goes back to the 1970's when he reviews the Maserati Bora. Jeremy compares Germany's and Russia's interpretations of British sports cars, the Wiesmann MF3 and TVR Tuscan, and The Stig takes them both for a lap of the test track. Richard drives the Aston Martin DB9 Volante. Jeremy opens a public pool in a Rolls-Royce.—Allister Coots
